item.title: Most read posts in 2020
item.description: In 2020, 29 new posts were published to this blog on topics relating to data and forest products. Have an idea for a post youâ€™d like to see? Email Matt with any suggestions. Here are the most read posts from the Arbor Custom Analytics blog in 2020: Mixed models in R: a primer Getting your data into R from Google Sheets The three kinds of data scientists in forestry
